header.title: About GenMedia Creative Studio
header.introduction:
Welcome to GenMedia Creative Studio, an application showcasing Google Cloud's Vertex AI Generative Media models. This tool is designed to provide a hands-on experience with our full complement of generative AI APIs for image, video, speech, and music generation.

GenMedia Creative Studio is available on Google Cloud's [Vertex AI Creative Studio github repo](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/vertex-ai-creative-studio/tree/main/experiments/veo-app) for you to install, customize and make your own generative AI magic.

sections.title: Imagen
sections.description:
The **Imagen** page allows you to generate images from text prompts. You can control various parameters like aspect ratio, style, and content type.

**Available Models:**
*   Imagen 3 Fast
*   Imagen 3
*   Imagen 4
*   Imagen 4 Ultra

[Learn more about Imagen on Vertex AI](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/generative-ai/image/overview)

sections.title: Veo
sections.description:
The **Veo** page is for advanced video generation. You can create videos using several modes:
*   **Text-to-Video**: Create a video from a descriptive text prompt.
*   **Image-to-Video**: Animate a single static image.
*   **First/Last Frame**: Generate the video motion between a starting image and an ending image.
*   **Reference-to-Video**: Generate a video based on multiple asset images and an optional style reference image.

**Available Models:**
*   Veo 2
*   Veo 3 & Veo 3 Fast
*   Veo 3.1 & Veo 3.1 Fast

[Learn more about Veo on Vertex AI](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/generative-ai/video/overview)

sections.title: Gemini  Image Generation
sections.description:
Gemini Image Generation - Nano-banana

Generate, transform and edit images with simple text prompts, or combine multiple images to create something new. All in Gemini.

[Learn more about [Gemini 2.5 Flash Image]((https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/models/gemini/2-5-flash#image) and [Gemini 3 Pro Image](https://docs.cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/models/gemini/3-pro-image) on Vertex AI.

Learn more about [Search Grounding](https://docs.cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/grounding/grounding-with-google-search#grounding_support) with Gemini 3 Pro Image, see the [Service Specific Terms](https://cloud.google.com/terms/service-terms).

sections.title: Lyria
sections.description:
The **Lyria** page lets you generate musical scores. Provide a prompt describing the mood, genre, or instruments you want to hear.

**Available Models:**
*   Lyria

[Learn more about Lyria on Vertex AI](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/generative-ai/audio/overview)

sections.title: Gemini TTS
sections.description:
The **Gemini Text-to-Speech** page uses Google's latest generative TTS models to create high-quality, natural-sounding audio from text.

- **Text to Synthesize**: The raw text to be spoken.
- **Voice Prompt**: A prompt to guide the style, tone, and emotion of the voice.
- **Model**: Choose between faster or higher-quality models.
- **Voice**: Select from a variety of distinct voices.

Text-to-Speech Gemini-TTS is the latest evolution of our Text-to-Speech technology that's moving beyond just naturalness to giving granular control over generated audio using text-based prompts. Using Gemini-TTS, you can synthesize speech from short snippets to long-form narratives, precisely dictating style, accent, pace, tone, and even emotional expression, all steerable through natural-language prompts.

**Technical Audio Metrics:**
*   **Duration**: The total length of the generated audio clip in seconds.
*   **Tempo**: The estimated speed of speech, measured in beats per minute (BPM).
*   **Mean Pitch**: The average fundamental frequency of the voice, indicating how high or low it sounds overall.
*   **Pitch Range**: The difference between the highest and lowest pitch, showing the dynamic range of the voice.
*   **Pitch Std Dev**: A measure of pitch variation; higher values often indicate more expressive speech.
*   **Jitter**: Micro-variations in pitch that can affect perceived voice roughness or naturalness.
*   **Shimmer**: Micro-variations in volume that can also contribute to perceived voice quality.
*   **HNR (Harmonics-to-Noise Ratio)**: A measure of voice purity; higher values generally mean clearer, less breathy speech.

[Learn more about Gemini-TTS on Vertex AI](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/gemini-tts)

sections.title: Chirp3 HD
sections.description:
**Chirp 3** represents the latest generation of Google's Text-to-Speech technology, powered by large language models (LLMs). These high-definition voices are designed to deliver an unparalleled level of realism and emotional resonance, making them sound incredibly natural.

You can use Chirp 3 to:
*   Create realistic, conversational audio for applications.
*   Generate speech in dozens of languages and regions.
*   Control the pace, add pauses, and specify custom pronunciations.

[Learn more about Chirp 3 HD on Vertex AI](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/chirp3-hd)

sections.title: Virtual Try-On
sections.description:
[Virtual Try-On](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/image/generate-virtual-try-on-images) is a fully managed Vertex AI service to generate images of persons modeling fashion products.

**Virtual Try-On** brings Google's advanced image generation technology to developers and retail customers in the fashion industry. This experimental service provides an easy-to-use API and cutting edge quality for generating shots of models trying-on products.

With Virtual Try-On, you can create high quality listing photos with just an image of a person and a product to try on. Supported products are:
 * Tops: shirts, hoodies sweaters, tank tops, blouses
* Bottoms: Pants, leggings, shorts, skirts
* Footwear: Sneakers, boots, sandals, flats, heels, formal shoes

This workflow allows you to see how a piece of clothing looks on a person. You provide an image of a person and an image of a garment, and the model generates a new image of the person wearing the item.

sections.title: Product in Scene
sections.description:
**Imagen Product Recontext** brings Google's advanced image generation technology to developers and retailers for generating product images. This service provides an easy-to-use API and cutting edge quality for generating shots of products in new scenes and contexts.

With Product Recontext, you can create high quality listing photos with just an image of a product and an optional text prompt. Supported product categories are:
* Appliances
* Business and industrial
* Clothing
* Electronics
* Furniture
* Garden and yard
* Hardware
* Health and beauty
* Jewelry
* Pets
* Shoes
* Sporting goods
* Toys and games
* Vehicle

This workflow, also known as Product Recontextualization, allows you to take a product image and place it in a new scene. You provide an image of the product and a text prompt describing the new scene, and the model generates a new image of the product in that scene.

sections.title: Motion Portraits
sections.description: This workflow allows you to animate a still image of a person. You provide an image of a person and a text prompt describing the desired motion, and the model generates a short video of the person moving.

sections.title: Character Consistency
sections.description: This workflow allows you to generate a consistent character across multiple images. You provide one or more reference images of the character along with a the scene description for the character, and the model generates a series of images of that character in different poses and settings, chooses the best one that aligns with the reference images, and then creates a video of that character in the new scene.

sections.title: Interior Design
sections.description:
Starting with a flat floor plan, create a 3d view, then explore each room and change the interior design, resulting in a fresh new perspective.

Pavithra Sainath, Cloud AI, Applied AI Engineering

sections.title: Retro Games
sections.description:
The **Retro Games** workflow transforms images into 8-bit pixel art assets and animated video clips. You can:
*   Upload images for Player 1 and optionally Player 2.
*   Generate 8-bit avatars and character sprite sheets.
*   Create sequential video narratives using Gemini for storyboarding and Veo for video generation.
*   Automatically stitch scenes together with a branded bumper.
